XIII.i.6.1.g
.
Retroactive Lump-Sum Payment Eligibility
Public Law (PL) 107-330
authorized a retroactive lump-sum payment of MOHP, back to the
date of heroism
, which led to the award.
Important
:  The law’s language that no payment will be made under the lump-sum payment provision prior to October 1, 2003,
does not
mean that a retroactive payment cannot cover a period prior to that date.  It means only that VA could not process the award for the lump sum prior to that date.  The lump sum is payable to beneficiaries receiving the pension as of October 1, 2003, and to beneficiaries added to the MOHP rolls after that date.
Reference
:  For more information on retroactive lump-sum payments, see
38 CFR 3.802(d)
.
